name: Ocean Action
description:
Ocean Action is a game about recycling ocean debris. Anything that is thrown away rather than recycled ends up in the ocean one way or the other. In this game, you have 10 different levels to send different kinds of waste into the appropriate recycling bin.

How to play: click on the buttons with arrows to change their direction.

Credits

Art & Programming Shurooq Juma Music Purple-Planet.com Sound Effects GameBurp

* UI Flickers if played on mobile, otherwise, gameplay is fine.
